paragraph: Guadeloupe is an archipelago and overseas department and region of France in the Caribbean. It consists of six inhabited islands\u2014Basse-Terre, Grande-Terre, Marie-Galante, La D\u00E9sirade and the two inhabited \u00CEles des Saintes\u2014as well as many uninhabited islands and outcroppings. It is south of Antigua and Barbuda and Montserrat, north of the Commonwealth of Dominica. The region's capital city is Basse-Terre, located on the southern west coast of Basse-Terre Island; however, the most populous city is Les Abymes and the main center of business is neighbouring Pointe-\u00E0-Pitre, both located on Grande-Terre Island.
